summary: Yuki and Nina try in order to get her parents back together; however, after failed attempts running away seems like the only solution.
cast: Noë Sampy|Arielle Moutel|Tsuyu Shimizu|Hippolyte Girardot|Marilyne Canto|Jean-Paul Girardot|Kôko Mori|Nonoka Imaizumi|Arisa Arai|Mahault Sampy|Momoka Omori|Ryane Alaoui
title: Yuki & Nina
